SEARCH
Package wahoot.db.models

Class Quiz

java.lang.Object
wahoot.db.models.Quiz
@Entity(name="Quiz") public class Quiz extends Object
Entity class representing a quiz, which contains a collection of questions and is associated with a specific classroom.

      Creates a new quiz with the given ID, author, and classroom.
      Parameters:
      quizID - The unique identifier for the quiz.
      author - The teacher who authored the quiz.
      room - The classroom the quiz is associated with.

      public void setSpeedMultiplier(double speedMultiplier)
      Sets the speed multiplier for the quiz. This can affect the scoring.
      Parameters:
      speedMultiplier - The multiplier affecting the quiz's pace.

    • getSpeedMultiplier

      public double getSpeedMultiplier()
      Retrieves the speed multiplier for the quiz.

      Provides an iterator over the questions in the quiz.
      Returns:

      public List<Question> getQuestions()
      Retrieves the list of questions in the quiz.
      Returns:
      The list of questions.

    • startQuiz

      public void startQuiz() throws TimerException
      Starts the quiz, which begins the stopwatch timer. Throws an exception if the quiz is already started.
      Throws:
      TimerException - if the quiz has already been started.

    • stopQuiz

      public void stopQuiz() throws TimerException
      Stops the quiz and stops the internal stopwatch. Throws an exception if the quiz hasn't started.
      Throws:
      TimerException - if the quiz has not started yet.

    • setAuthor

      public void setAuthor(Teacher author)
      Sets the author of the quiz.
      Parameters:
      author - The teacher who is the author of the quiz.

    • getAuthor

      public Teacher getAuthor()
      Retrieves the author of the quiz.
      Returns:
      The teacher who authored the quiz.

    • setElpasedTime

      public void setElpasedTime(long elapsed)
      Sets the elapsed time for the quiz.
      Parameters:
      elapsed - The time in seconds that has elapsed since the quiz started.

    • getElapsedTime

      public long getElapsedTime()
      Gets the elapsed time for the quiz.
      Returns:
      The time in seconds that has elapsed since the quiz started.

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of questions in the quiz.
      Returns:
      The size of the quiz as an integer.

    • removeQuestion

      public void removeQuestion(Question question) throws QuizException
      Removes a question from the quiz if it exists. Throws an exception if the question is not found.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to remove.
      Throws:
      QuizException - if the question is not contained in the quiz.

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Randomly shuffles the order of questions in the quiz.

    • gradeQuestion

      public int gradeQuestion(Question question, String response)
      Grades a single question by comparing the provided response with the correct answer. Updates the maximum score based on the correctness of the response.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to be graded.
      response - The provided response to the question.
      Returns:
      Returns 1 if the response is correct, otherwise returns 0.

    • getLeaderboard

      public Leaderboard getLeaderboard()

    • finishQuiz

      public double finishQuiz()
      Completes the quiz, stops the timer, and calculates the final grade based on speed and correctness.
      Returns:
      The final grade for the quiz.
